item.title: PrestaShop Developer Conference 2025 - Event Recap
item.description: On November 19, 2025, the PrestaShop developer community convened in Paris, and online via a global livestream, for the third PrestaShop Developer Conference. The program featured hands-on sessions, live demonstrations, and expert talks, alongside a major announcement. Attendees deepened their understanding of the PrestaShop ecosystem, gained project information, and explored practical advancements they can apply in their daily work.

item.title: Hummingbird v2.0.0 Beta Is Available
item.description: We are thrilled to announce the release of Hummingbird v2.0.0 Beta. This milestone is the result of a monumental effort, representing more than 320 commits, 500 file changes, 50,000 additions, and 30,000 deletions. The goal is to deliver a developer-first, lightweight, and modular theme that establishes a new standard for the PrestaShop ecosystem.

item.title: Sunsetting the PrestaShop cron service
item.description: The PrestaShop cron service will be officially shut down in December 2025, marking the end of a legacy component that once helped stores without full server access automate scheduled tasks.

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - September 2025
item.description: Welcome to the September edition of the Core Monthly! This month was buzzing with activity around PrestaShop 9, with the team working on its first patch release and the community stepping up to expand the new Admin API. item.description: Welcome to the August edition of Core Monthly. This month brought an important security patch for 8.2, a new community feature in the back office, and a fresh call for contributions to expand the Admin API in PrestaShop 9.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - July 2025
item.description: On July 30th, 2025, we hosted another Live Update for the PrestaShop Project, highlighting the announcement of the upcoming One Page Checkout (OPC) feature in PrestaShop 9.1. We also covered the current state of the project, recent releases, and ongoing contribution initiatives, including the Admin API.
